Quickstrike:









Quickstrike paused and listened to his comm-link. "Moment of justice?" he 
repeated, musing to himself. "What's that tin-horn talkin' about? Where is 
he?" The said into his comm-link to Megatron. "Where are ya boss? Ah'm out 
here damaged."
